This page allows you to view a PDF-ready table of any single day's notices

Date

Enter the date of notices to appear - format "yyyy/mm/dd"

Checkbox - Today

Set date to current date

Sections

Click to select the sections whose notices to display

Checkbox - Select All

Selects all sections

Proceed

Click to load notices

Once ready, click the toast popup to print (either to pdf or directly to a printer)
